name: Utopian Book Collective
description: A book club focused on utopian and dystopian literature, meeting monthly in central Bristol.
details: Come along, join the dissection, cogitation, exuberation, confusion and libation! We don't have a hierarchical structure and decisions over the next book can be done in turn, or through discussion and scanning the internet.

events.details: We meet in central Bristol on the first Monday of every month, a new and exciting discussion ensues and we normally end with a few drinks and choose the next months wee bit of utopian or dystopian literature.

time.frequency: The first Monday of every month

location.address: Watershed Studio, 1 Canon's Rd, Bristol BS1 5TX

booking.details: Please RSVP on Meetup using the link above.
